metadata.title: CVE-2024-10975 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Nomad Community and Nomad Enterprise ("Nomad") volume specification isvulnerable to arbitrary cross-namespace volume creation throughunauthorized Container Storage Interface (CSI) volume writes. Thisvulnerability, identified as CVE-2024-10975, is fixed in Nomad CommunityEdition 1.9.2 and Nomad Enterprise 1.9.2, 1.8.7, and 1.7.15.

criterions.comment: nomad package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
